ingredients: 1/2 large yellow onion, chopped, about 1 cup
2 garlic cloves, smashed with the flat side of a knife, skin left on
3 fresh thyme sprigs and bay leaves
3 fresh thyme sprigs and bay leaves
1/2 pound(s) aged white cheddar and gruyere mix cheese (Cabot, Grafton, Roth Kase), grated, about 2 cups
2 ounce(s) good quality parmesan cheese, grated (about 2/3 cup)
3 cup(s) Roasted, Sliced Mixed Mushrooms – Oyster, Maitake, Shitake, Beech King (seasoned, lightly oiled, roasted at 400 for 8 min)
